Name: Borrelbar
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I always feel welcome in this bar. It has a nice Amsterdam atmosphere thanks to the owners and I think the service is great. Normal prices for a drink and sometimes also a delicious (free!) Snack. Really super cool! ‚Ä¶

Name: Borrelbar
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Drinks bar is very cozy. Relax on the terrace or enjoy dancing indoors oo cozy Amsterdam music. Staff is very welcoming and TV is on during the marathon. Recommended. ‚Ä¶

Name: Borrelbar
